user_query: I'm starting a new company and I need a catchy slogan. Can you provide me with a random quote to use as inspiration? Also, I would like to find some TV shows to watch during my breaks. Lastly, can you give me the details of COVID-19 cases in India?

TaskList.description: Fetch a random inspirational quote to help create a catchy slogan for the company.
Search for popular TV shows that can be watched during breaks.
Retrieve the latest COVID-19 case details in India.
